metadata.title: CVE-2024-28593 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The Chat activity in Moodle 4.3.3 allows students to inserta potentially unwanted HTML A element or IMG element, or HTML content thatleads to a performance degradation. NOTE: the vendor's Using_Chat page says"If you know some HTML code, you can use it in your text to do things likeinsert images, play sounds or create different coloured and sized text."This page also says "Chat is due to be removed from standard Moodle."

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
